DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial study physical activity behavioral intervention obese endometrial cancer survivor . Learning physical activity behavior participate fitness class may help increase physical activity improve quality life obese endometrial cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Behavioral Intervention Obese Endometrial Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine effect 12-week behavior/exercise intervention moderate-vigorous physical activity ( > 150 minute ) among ethnically diverse endometrial cancer survivor . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine effect 12-week behavior/exercise intervention body composition among ethnically diverse endometrial cancer survivor . TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine effect 12-week behavior/exercise intervention ethnically diverse endometrial cancer survivor physical function quality-of-life . II . To determine important behavioral variable predict physical activity adherence . III . To determine significant facilitator barrier adherence 12-week intervention . IV . To compare thematic difference high-adherence low-adherence participant qualitatively assess strengths weakness 12-week intervention . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 group GROUP I : Participants partake 30 minute group discussion regard physical activity behavior follow 60 minute moderate-intensity exercise comprise 5 minute warm-up , 25 minute cardiovascular training , 20 minute resistance training exercise use body weight exercise band , 10 minute cool-down stretch weekly 12 week . Participants also complete brisk walk 90 minute per week outside class 12 week . GROUP II : Participants receive handout indicate importance physical activity improve nutrition health outcome . After 12 week , patient invite participate physical behavior intervention Group I . After completion study , participant follow 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent form sign date subject English and/or Spanish speaking History endometrial cancer stage IIV > 6 month < 5 year , currently receive cancer treatment Overweight ( body mass index [ BMI ] > = 30 ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status ( PS ) 0 2 Medically capable perform moderate intensity exercise Must engage regular ( > 3x/week , physical activity program last 6 month ) Medical contraindication exercise
